history.proof: intros. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - reflexivity. - exfalso. apply (Rlt_irrefl 0). qsimpl time: 2. - exfalso. apply (Rlt_irrefl 0). qsimpl time: 2 use: Rlt_trans,Rlt_0_1.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "x" in the current goal.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := 0); [apply Rlt_0_1 | apply Hx].
exceptions.exn: In environment x : R H : 0 < x Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < 1" with "0 < 0".

original: intros x H. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - reflexivity. - exfalso. apply (Rlt_irrefl 0). rewrite <- Hx. apply H. - exfalso. apply (Rlt_irrefl 0). apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := 0); [apply Rlt_0_1 | apply Hx].
